juice_products.name: Lemon Juice
juice_products.details: Juice is a drink made from the extraction or pressing of the natural liquid contained in fruit.

juice_products.name: Watermelon Juice
juice_products.details: Juice is a liquid that comes from plants, animals or fruit. The juice from fruit is often made into a drink.

juice_products.name: Orange Juice
juice_products.details: Fruit juice is 100% pure juice made from  fresh fruit or from whole fruit, depending on the type used.

juice_products.name: Strawberry Juice
juice_products.details: jFruit Juice. Fruit juices are biphasic colloidal systems consisting of a liquid phase, termed the “serum,”.
